function_description: Show/hide the sidebar using the bar and arrow icon.
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards web app with the sidebar visible.
steps: Locate the bar and arrow icon in the top-left corner next to the 4ga Boards logo.
Click on the icon to toggle the visibility of the sidebar.
expected_state: The sidebar is either shown or hidden according to the user's action, allowing for more screen space or quick access to navigation.
